description:
The updated KÜHL Ramblr™ Short is cut from ÜBERKÜHL® Stretch fabric to keep up with the Ramblin' man. The next generation of bi-component fabric, ÜBERKÜHL® Stretch is stronger, lighter and dries faster than cotton. A touch of spandex adds stretch for comfort and freedom of movement.

The gusseted crotch allows freedom of movement, and the waistband is lined with soft micro-chamois for unmatched comfort. The Vintage Patina Dye lends a classic look to this modern performance short.

The 3D pocket keeps your phone secure. Easy care, wash and wear keep you ramblin'.
name: Kuhl Ramblr Shorts, 8" Inseam - Mens
